description:
Hans, the young man you met at The Gibbet Tree, said sister Leisel had run away to join the Carnivale.
It surely can't be a coincidence, this must be the travelling circus he was talking about.
You remember Hans' words clearly: 'weird, grotesquee and macabre' was how he described it.
You have to admitd tha you are intrigued.

exits.description: Pay the fee and enter the Carnivale now.
Wait until dark and enter under the cover of the night.
Do nothing and leave this place.
